user_stories.text: Users can exchange emails securely with predefined recipients.
Users can send large files securely.
Users can set time limits on emails for reading.
Users can send emails securely to unspecified recipients.
Administrators of organizations can monitor emails.
Each organization can set security policies and define recipients groups.
Users can manage their emails effectively.
Users and administrators can backup emails securely.
Users and administrators can delete emails completely.
Users can access emails from mobile.
Users can send short messages securely to each other.

event.title: GOOD RECRUIT
event.description: New recruit is really good. You may roll 2 dice now and add these to the last roll.

event.title: HOME OFFICE
event.description: You have worked well at home. Add 2 points to the last roll.

event.title: BROWN BAG MEETING
event.description: Discussion during lunch time led to a splendid idea. Work on the current card is instantly resolved.

event.title: GURU
event.description: A guru visited your office. You may immediately remove one problem card from the current story.

event.title: DOING WELL
event.description: Things are going incredibly well. Add 4 to the last roll.

event.title: VISIBLE EFFORT
event.description: The boss acknowledges your effort. You may add 3 points to the previous result.

event.title: FAIRY
event.description: A fairy helped you. A card in progress is instantly finished.

event.title: SICK AT HOME
event.description: You are sick at home. Skip your next turn.

event.title: HEALTH PROBLEM
event.description: You have caught a cold. Skip your next turn.

event.title: HARD DRIVE CRASHED
event.description: Hard drive crashed. Remove all progress from a card in progress.

event.title: EMERGENCY CALL
event.description: An emergency call informs about an incident in the office. Everyone skips next turn

event.title: BUSINESS TRIP
event.description: You are sent on a business trip. Skip next turn.

event.title: REQUIREMENTS CHANGE
event.description: PO decided to make changes to the project. So this story will take 4 hours more.

event.title: EXTRA COST
event.description: Your work costs more than planned. Add 6 hours to the story estimation.

event.title: BIRTHDAY
event.description: It is your birthday today. Subtract 1 point from everybody's dice roll today.

solution.title: GET SOME REST
solution.description: Get some rest to refresh your mind.

solution.title: CONSULTING
solution.description: Involve a skilled team member from other team to consult you.

solution.title: EXTRA MEMBER
solution.description: Add another member to the team. Throw dice once at any moment you want.

solution.title: TL-SUPPORT
solution.description: Your team lead is ready to take a part of the work.

solution.title: SHARE GOALS
solution.description: Get the team together and share the key project goals.

solution.title: LESSONS LEARNT
solution.description: Apply experience destilled from former retrospectives.

solution.title: COLLABORATION
solution.description: Get the team together with PO and exchange information.

solution.title: ENHANCE SKILLS
solution.description: Get training for raising the level of your skill.

problem.title: TECHNICAL OBSTACLE
problem.description: Your work is blocked by a technical obstacle.

problem.title: BAD QUALITY
problem.description: You cannot finish the story because the quality is inadequate.

problem.title: UNCLEAR SPEC
problem.description: The specification is not clear enough for you.

problem.title: UNSATISFIED USERS
problem.description: You feel that users are not satisfied.

problem.title: DATA IS MISSING
problem.description: You can't work with the story, as you don't have important data from PO.

problem.title: BAD COMMUNICATION
problem.description: You cannot communicate well with other team members. They just don't get you.

problem.title: POOR SKILLS
problem.description: You are not skilled enough to finish the work.

problem.title: UNSTABLE SYSTEM
problem.description: System is very unstable. You have to test with major difficulties

problem.title: BAD MOOD
problem.description: Today you are upset. So you are too lazy to work.

problem.title: INTEGRATION ISSUES
problem.description: Your colleague provided you with the component, which is different from what you expected. Your work is blocked.

event_codes.2: add 2 points to the last roll
event_codes.4: remove one problem from this card
event_codes.8: remove progress from card in progress
event_codes.12: substract 1 from every one rolls this day
